title: Dripstoil
author: Dripstoil
created_time: June 05, 2022, 06:01:07 AMLast edit: June 10, 2022, 11:19:47 AM by Dripstoil
content: Having a social media handle that is the same on every social media platforms will enhance your brand equity and makes it easier for users to find you. It makes the marketing process easier and simpler. If you have a different handle for every platform, people will be confused if that is the same brand. Getting a domain name with a matching handle will allow users to find your betting platform more easily. That shows high level of business preparedness and professionalism. What’s more, it’ll make printed marketing materials clearer and memorable.

comments.author: Dripstoil
comments.body: All the exact social media handles will be handed to the lucky buyer at no extra cost. I have received some number offers but I need a really impressive over that would match the value of this great Gambling Domain Name.

comments.author: keyscore44
comments.body: It's a pity that you don't provide a minimum price or "buy it now" price.Besides, this is probably not the appropriate section for posting such ads. I think that you will attract more attention of potential buyers by posting this offer in Bitcoin Forum> Economy> Marketplace> Goods> Digital goods secion here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=93.0

comments.author: Dripstoil
comments.body: This is the best time to launch your gambling startup with this world class premium domain name. Hurry before it's gone!

comments.author: Dripstoil
comments.body: If you need to ask me any question about this domain, feel free to do so by posting on this thread.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: Dripstoil on June 05, 2022, 06:01:07 AMThis premium gambling domain name was voted by over 100 Branding Experts as the best brandable for gambling Casino.Who are these experts and can you send us the link to the results of the poll, it's just your imagination if you're not posting the result of the link, I would not even consider this a premium gambling domain, the premium gambling domain are domain with the word gambling on it, you should post your price here so we can help you figure out the cost of this domain if I'm the buyer I don't think I will bid more than $100 here.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: like I said in your previous thread. if you are gonna sell gambling domains, you better post them on Digital goods or Auctions(if you ever plan to auction the domain) since it belongs there. you can either move this thread to digital goods or auctions or click report to moderator and ask for the thread to be moved there.

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: Post your announcement of sell in Goods, Digital Goods Section, maybe you'll find someone interested in buying your domain.Name also seems so good, But can you provide data and analysis which says that your domain is reviewed as the best brandable name for gambling?This would be very interesting.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: acroman08 on June 09, 2022, 05:12:54 PMlike I said in your previous thread. if you are gonna sell gambling domains, you better post them on Digital goods or Auctions(if you ever plan to auction the domain) since it belongs there. you can either move this thread to digital goods or auctions or click report to moderator and ask for the thread to be moved there.OP thinks that it is gambling-related because he is selling a gambling based domain name, he is trying to target the right audience for what he is offering, and he is good at marketing his offer since he claimed that this domain is voted as the best gambling domain, he should provide proof, the potential seller will not just take his words, he will still ask and verify the claim.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Dripstoil on June 05, 2022, 06:01:07 AMEach individual voted according to the merit of every name submitted in different categories. Betflexi.com was voted the best brandable name in the gambling category. You're trying hard to sell your domain at a very good price I Google and see if there is information about the domain you're selling and this is what I see, see no information about the voting if it was done in an online public voting poll And checking a tool for the projected price of a domain and this is the result, so don't expect that you're going to sell it for thousands of dollars, but you're one lucky guy if you sold it at the price you want.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: I don't think it matters much, but if you can find a domain name that suits your casino, it will allow you to compete with other casinos and be less competitive. Usually, the domain name is chosen by something related to the business you want to build and if it is about gambling, the choice of a domain name will use the word gambling or something related to the game or crypto. After that, for marketing, they can use the brand and if they can provide good service, people will bookmark the website so they can directly click and visit it.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: This is exactly why stunna and primedice team bought stake. I mean they could have turned primedice into a casino as well, they didn't need to buy stake, and they bought it for a pretty cheap price if I am not wrong, cheap compared to what they are doing with it right now of course.But, they bought it because they believed that if they had a good brandable name, they could be working everywhere, and they got handles for it as well on social media. If you can buy a name like that, which is both English and brandable that would be perfect. If not, then do not go with xxxdice and put whatever there, or anything like that, make it reasonable and related to the topic.

He thinks he will target the right audience but I think that most of us here are not planning to create our own site but most of the users here are just posting because they can relate on some topics and most of all is to earn something because they are enrolled in a signature campaign. Posting the stuff that he is going to sell in the link posted by @acroman08 is already a big thing as there are buyers that visits that section.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: Quote from: Dripstoil on June 05, 2022, 06:01:07 AMIf you have a different handle for every platform, people will be confused if that is the same brand. Definitely. That's why you need to stick with your own brand and name it the same for every platform that you can market out. It's confusing and out of style.For what, you name your website and it's on Facebook and then it will be a different name on Twitter. Well, that doesn't really make sense right? That's why it is obvious for a business to have its name the same for all of its marketable platforms.

comments.author: Hydrogen
comments.body: It is true that building a reputation and name is important for long term brand name recognition and trust.People trust the names and brands they recognize the most. While new names trend towards reduced trust, similar to new unknown accounts on social media. Of course there are exceptions. Satoshi Nakamoto for one. Those who might believe the ideas or things they create are more important than the identity of those who created them.Over the long term, some of the gambling accounts I followed turned out to be scammers. Others ended up losing money and deleted. Having a consistently profitable name in the gambling industry is a badge of honor reserved for very few.
